resources.string: The crispiest BDF you will find in Kochi .
One of the perfect ice tea available here in kochi . Perfect blend of Ice , lemon and tea .
Al Funghi - Tomato sauce , Fresh mushrooms and mozzarella cheese
Mushroom Chicken - Chicken , Tomato sauce , Fresh mushrooms , mozzarella cheese , Extra virgin oil
Medium cooked chicken steak with mash potato and veggies. One of the best flavoured sauce and fine cut steak you'll get in kochi .
Penne Pasta in white sauce served with toast .
An amateur food blogger who enjoys tasting and reviewing the food served around Kochi.
